str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
Isaiah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Hesaias, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
